title: Ignite
slogan: Track, Analyze, Succeed: All in One Dashboard.
tag: A responsive CRM dashboard that provides an intuitive interface to manage and track customer information, deals, and performance.
description: This project was a hands-on learning experience that deepened my understanding of core web development fundamentals. The dashboard features a responsive design and light and dark themes toogle. It also provides insightful data visualizations using Chart.js. This project honed my skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and data visualization.
